title: Development and Application of a Mobile-Based Vocabulary Learning Assessment Framework for [Large-Scale] Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary skills and fundamental proficiency in smart device usage
context.additional_context: Conducted in classroom settings using learners' personal devices (BYOD), focusing on acquiring specialized social domain vocabulary

learning_goals: Learners can design a framework to evaluate the 6 core elements of mobile vocabulary learning apps (learning tasks, goal clarity, feedback, strategy guidance, repetition, control functions)
Learners can apply the evaluation framework to comparatively analyze 5 or more mobile vocabulary learning apps
Based on analysis results, learners can propose effective mobile vocabulary learning strategies and establish their own learning plans
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
